I think you would have more accurate answers by mailing the JXUnit ml.

<advertisment>

When I have to deal with ressources that are external to my tests (like a
username/password), I use XMLPropertyManager:

XMLPropertyManager reads properties from an XML file and make them available
through static methods.

If you don't want to use XML, PropertyManager is also available.

And you can find these classes in the JUnit-addons package:
<http://junit-addons.sourceforge.net>

</advertisment>

Hope this help

-Vladimir
